title: CIDR Compare
description: Compare two lists of networks to identify changes for auditing

input.networkListsTooltip: Compare two network lists to identify additions, removals, and unchanged items
input.swapTooltip: Swap List A and List B
input.listATooltip: Original or 'before' state - CIDR blocks, IP ranges, or individual IPs
input.listBTooltip: Updated or 'after' state - CIDR blocks, IP ranges, or individual IPs

summary.title: Comparison Summary
summary.titleTooltip: Overview of changes between the two network lists

categories.addedTooltip: Networks present in List B but not in List A
categories.removedTooltip: Networks present in List A but not in List B
categories.unchangedTooltip: Networks present in both List A and List B
